tool_description: This API calls the Etherscan ERC20 Token Top Movers and displays the info in a clean and separated manner (price, volume,  market cap, holders)
name: Etherscan ERC20 Top Movers
title: Etherscan ERC20 Top Movers

api_list.name: Get ERC20 Top Movers
api_list.description: This endpoint displays the ERC20 Top Movers from Etherscan.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://etherscan-erc20-top-movers.p.rapidapi.com/tokens"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "etherscan-erc20-top-movers.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://etherscan-erc20-top-movers.p.rapidapi.com/tokens"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "etherscan-erc20-top-movers.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
